column4: i can view japanese website okay, but i can't view a japanese pdf. help
how do i search for the correct name?
in synaptic or apt-cache search asian
i found xfonts-intl-asian - International fonts for X -- Asian
i have xpdf and gnome-viewer. is acroread necessary to view asian fontst?
or try to search "cjk", sorry, I'm not running ubuntu, couldn't do the search here
acroread comes with better fonts, and X can use those fonts
other packages with acroread? like recommended for acroread from apt or just search
i tried opening the japanees pdf in acroread. it says "japanese language support pack is necessary." where do i get it?
i got japanese pdf working now
i just had to install xpdf-japanese
after i got xpdf working with Japnaenes, i didn't bother looking for acroread-japanese. do you prefer acroread? is it better than xpdf or gnome pdf viewer?
no, you want the fonts from acroread
